title: Martial Melee Weapons
content: The Holder of this Item gains:Weapon Enchantment +1 Equip item in main hand to gain: Flourish ActionLacerate Action Sword of Clutching Umbra 1d6 Piercing Martial Rare Melee Weapon 1.5m Light Finesse Shadowsoaked Strike: Strike an enemy, adding your Proficiency Bonus to the damage. Moreover, if the attack hits, it blow deals an additional 1d6 Psychic Damage. This attack doesn't break concealment.Weapon Enchantment +1FlourishPiercing Strike Sword of Light Stealing 1d6 +3Piercing Martial Very Rare
